newsitem.title: USA: MSNBC to offer Individual Freeloader.
newsitem.headline: MSNBC to offer Individual Freeloader.

text.p: PALO ALTO, Calif., Sept 11 (REUTER) - Individual Inc said it will unveil an exclusive deal on Thursday with MSNBC to allow users of MSNBC's site on the World Wide Web to download news from the Internet and read it off-line.

Individual said MSNBC, a joint partnership between General Electric Co's NBC news network and Microsoft Corp software giant would provide users with a customer version of Individual's FreeLoader software this autumn.

The special MSNBC version of the software will incorporate many of the elements expected to be included in the next upgrade of FreeLoader, version 2.0, and Individual said MSNBC would serve as a branded Internet channel for that software.

FreeLoader downloads news and information from the Internet so individuals can view it off-line, avoiding the waits associated with the global computer network by storing it on viewers' hard disks for speedy retrieval.
